page.title: 01WOLD NEWTON GAZETTEER
page.content: Agricultural community on Yorkshire Wolds:11miles NNW of Bridlington,13 miles S of Scarborough. {Administration}Humberside County Council,East Yorkshire Borough Council & Parish Council. {Population }225 {Dwellings }85 {Farms }12{Churches }1 {Schools} 1(Primary) {Shops}1(inc.P.O.) {Public Houses}1 {Businesses}Builder 1 Dairyman 1 Wine Wholesaler 1 Coach Operator 1 Hairdresser 1 Haulage Firm 1 {Bus Service}Twice daily{Utilities Water-Yorks.Water Auth.Electricity- Yorks.Elect.Board (No gas,no mains sewerage).{Emergency Services }Police, Fire,Ambulance-Bridlington or Driffield.{Public Buildings }Community Centre{Sports}Cricket,Soccer Pitches {Clubs/Societies}Womens'Institute, Cricket Club,Soccer Club,Wednesday Club(over 60s),Sunday School.
